name: 404 UX Template
description:
This is a 404 UX template designed to demonstrate the core components of a 404 page.

The guidelines followed to design this page are
1- "Improving the Dreaded 404 Error Message" article written by Jakob Nielsen (nngroup)
2- The 404 page checklist provided by checklist.design

Attributions
Socks icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
Magnifying Glass icon made by Good Ware from www.flaticon.com
